resources.string: IMPORTANT: Service dates QUANTITY of Machine: /duration dependent on the number of machine to be serviced. Therefore, the quantities noted above must be accurate otherwise DENNISON cannot guarantee the servicing of any machine above the numbers stated within the allotted service timeframe.

There is a sturdy table with leg room. The location has no through traffic or is in a busy lab. It is a vibration and draught free environment, with a temperature range of 17°C to 25°C. I understand that I may be charged for any technician/ Service time lost due to these conditions not being met.
Certificates will be provided on a USB memory stick at the end of the service. Please tick if for IT security reasons you will provide your own USB stick:
25°C. I understand that I may be charged for any technician/Service time lost due to these conditions not being met.

Pay & Display 1 Cost of parking: £7.00 for the day I think, but bring extra in case, use any hospital car park, I’ve always found that car park 4 (right of the roundabout and up the hill) is the best one for space)
